programme.title: MegaDrama: Bidadari Kiriman Tuhan Ep24
programme.desc: Manis nekad hendak menjaga Ayu jika Ayu tidak dapat terima Fiza. Manis mengharapkan Yusuf sudi untuk terima dia semula dan sama-sama menjaga Ayu.

programme.title: Rock Bro
programme.desc: Era rock mula meniti fasa kejatuhan dengan kemasukan aliran muzik rap dan hip-hop pada awal 90-an. Namun begitu, kumpulan Rimba Bara tetap meneruskan perjuangan muzik mereka.

programme.title: Romantika S6-Azwan Kombos & Ezzati Abdul Ep07

programme.title: MegaDrama: The Hotel Ep16

programme.title: MegaDrama: The Hotel Ep17

programme.title: Crippled Avengers
programme.desc: Chang Cheh presents this ultimate depiction of dysfunctional kung fu masters, overcoming their shortcomings to win the day, one corpse at a time.

programme.title: Duel of Fist
programme.desc: In this thriller by Chang Cheh, David Chiang and Ti Lung play two skilled boxers, one of whom finds his half brother in the Thai underworld.

programme.title: Love Parade
programme.desc: Sparks fly when a female doctor criticizes a fashion designer's creations, but love follows regardless.

programme.title: Brotherhood
programme.desc: Liu, who is trying to shed his criminal side, instead finds himself caught up in an all-out gang war that comes to a startling conclusion.

programme.title: My Name Ain't Suzie
programme.desc: A poor young woman becomes a popular bargirl in Hong Kong's gritty response to Hollywood's The World of Suzie Wong.

programme.title: The King Boxer
programme.desc: This drama captures the legend of a young boxer who battles the odds to become the ultimate fighter in a tournament against his greatest rivals.

programme.title: The Crimson Palm
programme.desc: Featuring the unforgettable song Country Road, Shaw's Huangmei Opera stars Ivy Ling Po and tells the tale of a poor student engaged to a billionaire's daughter.

programme.title: The Shadow Whip
programme.desc: Various people are out to get the Shadow Whip (an individual, not just a weapon). Starring Cheng Pei Pei and Yueh Hua.

programme.title: The Singing Killer
programme.desc: A singer is blackmailed into committing a heist but when he finds his first love working in the store which he's supposed to rob.

programme.title: Six Assassins
programme.desc: Ling Yun of 'Hellgate' plays a magician-warrior who unwittingly protects a villain from an ambush, until his wife and friend's deaths open his eyes.

programme.title: Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
programme.desc: Catch this rare gem, a product of Hong Kong-style science fiction, complete with out-of-this-world visual effects.

programme.title: Have Sword Will Travel
programme.desc: A drifter (David Chiang) and another swordsman (Ti Lung) are competitors for a woman's love who fate turns into brothers in arms.

programme.title: The Blue and the Black
programme.desc: This sequel captures how singer Tang Qi searches through battle-scarred China for her soldier lover, Xing Ya. However, are they fated to be apart?

programme.title: Intimate Confessions of a Chinese
programme.desc: This 1972 cult classic stars Lily Ho in her most audacious role as a mysterious courtesan caught in a web of sex and murder with her powerful madam.

programme.title: The Black Falcon
programme.desc: Two women and a man have to deal with forgery, fire and poisoned needles when they go up against a notorious gang.

programme.title: The Jade Raksha
programme.desc: Cheng Pei-pei turns human combine harvester as she hacks a path through life, avenging the death of her family under the moniker 'The Jade Raksha'.

programme.title: Invincible Enforcer
programme.desc: This hard-hitting drama is based on a real-life investigation on the involvement of both cops as well as crooks in second offences.

programme.title: All Men Are Brothers
programme.desc: This sequel depicts how the brothers of the Water Margin embark on a hunt for the thieves. Will they succeed and if so, at what cost?

programme.title: The Dancing Millionairess
programme.desc: One of the most enjoyable musicals to grace the Hong Kong screen, this classic stars the husband-and-wife team of Peter Chen and Betty Loh.

programme.title: The Web of Death
programme.desc: A traitorous clansman bids to locate and then unleash the deadly 'Five Venom Spider' against those who bid to stand in his way.

programme.title: The Happy Trio
programme.desc: Following the lives of three downtrodden, but resilient outcasts, John Lo Mar's gritty social drama paints a sense of realism rarely seen in Hong Kong movies.

programme.title: Vengeance Is a Golden Blade
programme.desc: In this tale of greed, lust and vengeance, only Silver Swallow can stop the golden blade.

programme.title: Les Belles
programme.desc: Lauded as one of the greatest Hong Kong musicals of the 60s, this award-winning piece starring Linda Lin Dai as a dancer who finds romance with her boss's son.

programme.title: The Black Butterfly
programme.desc: A waitress, who is secretly the outlaw Black Butterfly, steals from the rich and gives to the poor but picking the wrong targets sets the law on her heels.

programme.title: Love Without End
programme.desc: This classic romance stars Linda Lin and Kwan Shan, capturing a touching love story between a famous nightclub singer and a young architect.

programme.title: Tiger Killer
programme.desc: Adapted from the novel Water Margin and starring Ti Lung, this award-winning drama depicts how the courageous Wu Song defeats a tiger, and his bond with Wu Da Lang.

programme.title: Carry on Doctors and Nurses
programme.desc: Director Chan Friend joins award-winning social satirist Alfred Cheung Kin Ting in this delightful variation on the hugely successful British Carry On!

programme.title: Fallen Angels
programme.desc: The funkier cousin to Chungking Express, director Wong Kar Wai's offering follows five fallen angels who suffer love & loss amidst the crime & chaos of Hong Kong's neon nights.

programme.title: In Your Dreams
programme.desc: Hong Kong Asian Film Festival's opening film by first-time producer, Carina Lau. When a youth who was abandoned by his mother meets a lonely teacher at school, they develop a strong bond.

programme.title: 77 Heartbreaks
programme.desc: When Eva ends her ten-year relationship with Adam, he's shocked by the seeming suddenness of the break-up till reading her private journal reveals it was the culmination of 77 heartbreaks.

programme.title: A Cool Fish
programme.desc: A series of comical events follow when a petty thief, a roguish security guard & a potty-mouthed woman find their lives intersecting one day over a lost gun & a heist.

programme.title: Kung Fu Monster
programme.desc: In the waning years of the Ming dynasty, a government official is forced to team up with a band of thieves to capture monsters that have escaped from the royal palace.

programme.title: Miao Miao
programme.desc: An awkward young beauty enchants her outgoing classmate. Unfortunately, she falls in love with a someone else instead and decides to quietly pursue him.

programme.title: Bleeding Steel
programme.desc: Starring Jackie Chan, Show Lo & Nana Ou-yang, this film portrays a hardened special forces agent who fights to protect a young woman from a sinister criminal gang.

programme.title: My Alien Girlfriend
programme.desc: Yuen Qiu, Susan Shaw & Law Kar Ying star in this comedy about Angela, who comes to earth for the first time to look for her brother, who came looking for love. But it is her who finds it in a kind man.

programme.title: I Still Remember
programme.desc: An uplifting sports drama focusing on a property agent who leads an aimless, unfulfilling life & his P.E teacher, as they seek to find purpose in their lives.

programme.title: Manhunt
programme.desc: Director John Woo gathers Chinese, Japanese & Korean superstars - Zhang Han Yu, Masaharu Fukuyama & Ha Ji Won - in this remake of the classic crime thriller.

programme.title: Love for Life
programme.desc: In a small Chinese village, where an illegal trade in human blood has caused the spread of HIV, two people dying of AIDS risk their all for love & a last chance at happiness.

programme.title: MMA Diva
programme.desc: When MMA Diva Xin Lan suffers a defeat to He Hua and loses her father's club, an injured Xin Lan seeks out a retired fighting legend to help reclaim her honour.

programme.title: Chongqing Hot Pot
programme.desc: This action comedy HKIFF 2016 hosts Chen Kun & Bai Bai He in this story of three hot pot restaurant owners who stumble upon a bank vault located in their vicinity.

programme.title: Nightfall
programme.desc: A man who was wrongly convicted 20 years ago becomes the prime suspect in the murder of the abusive father of a young pianist. Has the victim turned into a killer?

programme.title: Girls VS Gangsters
programme.desc: Xi Wen is getting married! Throwing her a wild bachelorette party in Vietnam are Xi Wen's best friends, Kimmy & the glamourous Jia Lan. Will it be the awesome night they imagine?

programme.title: Line Walker
programme.desc: Nominated as New Director in 2017 HKFA, Sharmaine Sheh is back with newly joint Nicky Cheung, Louis Koo and Francis Ng in the search for the 6th undercover!

programme.title: A Nail Clipper Romance
programme.desc: Starring Zhou Dong Yu & Joseph Chang, this comedy depicts a young man falling in love with a girl who only eats nail clippers!

programme.title: Legend of the Demon Cat
programme.desc: Starring Huang Xuan & Liu Hao Ran, this winner of five awards tells the legend of a demon cat who disrupts the peace during the Tang Dynasty, causing a series of strange events.

programme.title: As Tears Go By
programme.desc: Wah and Fly are cousins and best buddies but Wah is hesitant to maintain their relationship as he is involved with the mob. Then, Fly offended a mob boss one day, forcing Wah to interfere.

programme.title: MMA Diva
programme.desc: When MMA Diva Xin Lan suffers a defeat to He Hua and loses her father's club, an injured Xin Lan seeks out a retired fighting legend to help reclaim her honour.

programme.title: Model Family
programme.desc: A young family anticipates much joy when they move to a harmonious new neighbourhood. However, they are soon to find that things only look perfect on the surface.

programme.title: Xiao Ming & His Buddies
programme.desc: This heart-warming comedy will have you shedding tears of laughter. While burglarizing a bungalow, Liu Bei and his gang of dim-witted thieves meet their match in little Xiao Ming and his friends.

programme.title: When Sun Meet Moon
programme.desc: Shortlisted at the 8th Beijing International Film Festival, starring Kathy Yuen & Daichi Harashima. Two young astrology enthusiasts meet under the starry night during a massive power outage in Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Golden Job
programme.desc: Former mercenaries reunite for a noble heist only to realize that one of them is double-crossing them. Filmed across Europe & Asia and stars Ekin Cheng, Jordan Chan, Michael Tse, Jerry Lamb & Chin Ka Lok.

programme.title: Hotel Soul Good
programme.desc: After her boyfriend and job are stolen by her best friend, Mei Qi is hit by a fragment of a meteor, which gives her the ability to see three elderly spirits who need her help to fulfill their last wishes.

programme.title: Killer Limo
programme.desc: Full of sword fights and action-packed sequences, catch this exciting crime-action about a young woman who seeks revenge against criminal organizations who killed his father in Thailand.

programme.title: The Conjuring 2
programme.desc: This supernatural thriller follows another real case from the files of renowned demonologists Ed and Lorraine Warren.

programme.title: The Time Traveler's Wife
programme.desc: Artist Clare Abshire shares a deep emotional bond with Henry De Tamble, a handsome librarian who travels involuntarily through time.

programme.title: Kick-Ass 2
programme.desc: Kick-Ass inspires a new wave of self-made masked crusaders, who become the target of the reborn Red Mist.

programme.title: Wonder Woman: Bloodlines
programme.desc: Wonder Woman fights to free a troubled young girl enlisted by the deadly organization Villainy Inc., whose criminal members have their sights set on invading Themyscira; Wonder Woman's paradise home.

programme.title: The Lego Batman Movie
programme.desc: Big changes are brewing in Gotham City and lone vigilante Batman may have to try to work with others to save the city from The Joker.

programme.title: The Notebook
programme.desc: A couple proves that true love is strong enough to withstand the brutal tests of memory and time.

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Harrison Ford is adventurer Indiana Jones and he's out to find a powerful relic before the Nazis do!

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
programme.desc: Harrison Ford stars as the intrepid adventurer on the trail of a cult that enslaves children.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
programme.desc: After settling down to a quieter life, Indy is thrust back into action when his father mysteriously disappears while on a quest for the Holy Grail.

programme.title: Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
programme.desc: Harrison Ford is back as Indy in this new globe-trotting adventure, as he tries to find the secret behind the mysterious Crystal Skull.

programme.title: Assassin's Creed
programme.desc: Through a technology that unlocks his memories, Callum discovers he is a descendant of an ancient line of Assassins and amasses lethal skills to take on the oppressive Templar Order.

programme.desc: The ten-episode one-hour series explores relationship issues and marital challenges, and depicts painful dilemmas for the characters through a unique lens on their daily lives.

programme.title: Snow White and the Huntsman

programme.title: The Notebook

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep105
programme.desc: Rammy's tips on focus and meditation come in handy when Sir Steel's Replicator causes havoc in the Central Forest with giant donuts.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep122
programme.desc: Paddington accidentally ruins Mr. Browns lovely lawn and must repair it. // Mrs. Bird is a champion hide and seeker but where is she? Paddington, Jonathan and Judy must find her.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep123
programme.desc: Paddington invites Mr Curry to stay with the Browns whilst his house is being repaired. He thinks the Browns are too disorganized. // Paddington accidentally takes a banana from the caf without paying.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S4 Ep403
programme.desc: Blaze, AJ, and Darington are in the front row for the amazing Chicken Circus! But when Crusher launches the chickens far, far away, it's up to Blaze and Darington to get their feathered friends back!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S4 Ep404
programme.desc: Ninja Master Blackbelt is training Blaze and AJ to be powerful ninjas when Crusher and Pickle accidentally launch themselves onto an icy mountain! Blaze and AJ must use their ninjas skills to rescue them.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep113
programme.desc: Santiago and Mami team up to take down an old foe and retrieve a lost family treasure.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S4 Ep402
programme.desc: Everest and Jake try to rescue a penguin and end up stranded at sea on a homemade bridge. // Katie's kittens are all covered in mud and running amuck! If they're not rounded up, the Cat Show will be ruined

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S4 Ep401
programme.desc: When an accident destroys Bubble Puppy's doghouse, the Guppies team up with the entire neighborhood to build Bubble Puppy's dream home - the most tricked out doghouse Bubbletucky has ever seen!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S5 Ep508
programme.desc: When Agnes the Dragon moves to the Kingdom of Roses, everyone is afraid of her fearsome roar! Everyone except Zooli, who befriends Agnes and shows her friends how lovable Agnes really is!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep203
programme.desc: The family watches 'Detective Potato' on TV. Peppa and George want to be detectives too so Daddy Pig gives them a mystery to solve. Teddy is hidden and Peppa and George must follow the clues to solve it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep204
programme.desc: Peppa and George are playing with bubbles. When it runs out, Daddy Pig shows them how to make big bubbles with an old tennis racket and soapy water. He makes a big, muddy, bubbly puddle to jump in.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep205
programme.desc: It's nearly time for bed. Peppa and George are called in for their baths before going to bed. Soon they are fast asleep. Mummy and Daddy Pig finally sit down, but it's been a long day and they are sleepy.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep110
programme.desc: On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S1 Ep102
programme.desc: It's Blue's birthday! We're playing Blue's Clues to figure out what present Blue wants. As we look for clues, we help Josh get ready for the party by observing patterns and take a trip to Joe's Present Store

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S4 Ep407
programme.desc: When three big emergencies turn out to be too much for one truck alone, Blaze turns himself and his friends into super strong robots to save Axle City!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S4 Ep408
programme.desc: Blaze and Zeg are in Dinosaur Valley, showing off their amazing robot powers to their dinosaur friends. But when they discover three lost little Tyrannosauruses, they must get the babies home safely.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S5 Ep526
programme.desc: Rocky and the Pups are fixing an Old-Timey Junk Car for Ace Sorensen's Birthday! // Adventure Bay is working hard to earn the record for having the world's highest tower of pizzas!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep501
programme.desc: Mayor Humdinger makes fake emergencies for his kitties to save so they look better than the PAW Patrol. // The Wingnuts get a pet ostrich but it gets lost on the way home. The PAW Patrol must find it!

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep103
programme.desc: Lola tries her hand at being the park keeper for the day (Ian is on holiday) but things do not go according to her plan.

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep105
programme.desc: When Kaison's car gets tangled and breaks down, Calvin and ROBO G try to fix it with their FAST FIXIT machine but it gets jammed inside the machine. Calvin has to use his PLAY POWER to fix it, and fast!

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep106
programme.desc: It's time for the ULTIMATE RACE DAY - on a race track built in the Kid Cave. But when the track gets broken mid race, Calvin must use his PLAY POWER to pull off the most epic stunt jump ever!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep115
programme.desc: Ms. Potts is missing home, so Paddington decides to hold a surprise Chinese New Year Party. // Mr. Brown is taking the kids to the Circus tonight but they have lost their tickets!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep116
programme.desc: The Browns are having their annual summer games. Will Paddington be good at any of them? // Mrs. Brown has bought an old camper van and decides to take the family on a camping holiday.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep208
programme.desc: Peppa and her family are having a picnic. Mr Zebra the Postman and Zo Zebra are having a picnic too, so they decide to have one big picnic. When it's home time, Peppa leaves her teddy behind.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep209
programme.desc: There's a new pupil at the playgroup, Emily Elephant. Everybody wants to be her friend because she is very good at building blocks and can make a loud noise with her trunk.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep210
programme.desc: George and Rebecca Rabbit's little brother Richard each have a toy dinosaur but they are not very good at sharing their toys. Mummy Pig shows them that they can have much more fun if they play together.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep211
programme.desc: Peppa, her family and friends are playing at the pond with their toy boats. Everyone has a boat but Rebecca Rabbit. Daddy Pig makes her one with newspaper. It's so nice that everyone wants one.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S5 Ep502
programme.desc: Dirty Deema has stolen Molly and Gil's soap, and made The Kingdom of Clean very dirty! Molly and Gil have to get their soap back, and clean up the kingdom!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep212
programme.desc: Hop in for a ride in Josh and Blue's Anywhere Box, where we can pretend to go... ANYWHERE! We play Blue's Clues to figure out where Blue wants to go, and visit the outdoors and even our friend Polka Dots!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep213
programme.desc: Sharpen your pencils, because Josh and Blue are going to SCHOOL! While Blue and her friends go through their school day, we play Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to share at Show and Tell.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 Ep518
programme.desc: Blaze and AJ are super excited to play their new video game. But when a video game wizard makes the game come alive, Blaze and AJ must level up and save Axle City from pixel pandemonium

programme.desc: Paddington wins a raffle and his prize is a meal for two at Sofia's caf, but who is Paddington's BEST FRIEND? // Pigeonton has nested in a Lamppost outside Mr. Gruber's shop but the council condemns it!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep128
programme.desc: Peppa and George's cousin Chloe comes to their house. Peppa tries to show Chloe that she is a big girl, but it is very hard.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep131
programme.desc: Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep132
programme.desc: Peppa and George are having a picnic, when a thunderstorm starts. They go inside, but Peppa and George are still scared because the thunderstorm is making lots of noise.

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep113
programme.desc: All of Calvin's slime has gone off! ROBO G helps him create a fresh batch with a Super Slime Machine! But when the machine goes crazy, Calvin has to use his PLAY POWER to save the day.

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep114
programme.desc: A sudden power failure leaves ROBO G critically low on battery and the kid cave in virtual darkness. It's up to Calvin to use his PLAY POWER to fix the Mega Power Maker and get ROBO G fully charged up!

programme.title: Ready Set Dance S2 Ep201
programme.desc: Myka the Flamingo is little different from all the other animals. She has her own style and she is very proud of that!
